channel.title: News on CityU Wang Lab
channel.description: Recent content in News on CityU Wang Lab

item.title: News of our lab
item.description: 2020 · 2020.01 Congratulations for our research was reported in the ‘Asia Reaseach News’ magazine! Our publication “Gene Expression Signature in Surgical Tissues and Endoscopic Biopsies Identifies High-risk T1 Colorectal Cancers” in Gastroenterology was reported in the recent ‘Asia Reaseach News’ magazine! 2019 · 2019.09 Dr. Wang was invited to give a talk in ‘The 3rd international symposium on the frontiers of stress medicine’ in Chengdu, Sichuan, China. · 2019.09 New members: Rayna joined our group as a joint PhD student in June!
